markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unbelievable Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=3276) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 143</row>

**Archetype** [Unexpected Sharpshooter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=123)

**Prerequisites**
[Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3272)

</column>

---

While no one, not even you, might appear to understand why, you demonstrate a greater ability to hit your targets regardless of the obstacles in your way. You can use the [Accidental Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3272) activity granted to you by the Unexpected Sharpshooter Dedication once per hour instead of once per day.
name: Unbelievable Luck
